column2: My lord! I bring grave news. The heathen Sultan of Rum has amassed an army and is launching an attack! The Bulgarian rebels have seen this as a signal to rise up! Your martial suggests keeping the levys in Bulgaria back to deal with the rebels. However it will mean we will be unable to use them in this war...
We can not risk loosing Bulgaria...
We must push the heathens back at any cost!

My lord! I bring ill news. One of the warring rebel factions in Bulgaria has managed to organize and gain widespread support. Their leader has proclaimed himself king. They have gained control of the area in a large series of castle raids and is ceding from us!
Damnit! I will have his head!
